wikipedia_page.main: Simon Christopher Joseph Fraser, 16th Lord Lovat and 5th Baron Lovat (born 13 February 1977) has been the chief of Clan Fraser of Lovat since the death of his grandfather in 1995.

response: * Simon Fraser, 16th Lord Lovat (born 1977), Chief of Clan Fraser

response: *Simon Fraser, 16th Lord Lovat (1977–), chief of Clan Fraser of Lovat

link_mentions.page: Simon Christopher Joseph Fraser, 18th Lord Lovat

response: Honor Fraser (born 1973) is a Scottish art dealer in California and a former fashion model. She is the sister of Simon Fraser, 16th Lord Lovat and chief of Clan Fraser of Lovat, and the granddaughter of British Commando Simon Fraser, 15th Lord Lovat. She was brought up at the family seat Beaufort Castle in Scotland.
